p: The allelopathy and antioxidant experiments were repeated three times (three replications). In each experiment, the measurements were measured in triplicate. The data were subjected to one-way analysis of variance, followed by Duncanâ€™s test at probability level 0.05 using COSTAT software program (CoHort Software, Monterey, CA, USA). The soil variable data were subjected two-tailed t-test at the probability level of 0.05 using XLSTAT 2018 (Addinsoft, New York, NY, USA).
